title: Module 1 – Understanding APIs
summary: What APIs are, why they matter, and real-world examples across industries.

title: Module 2 – Picking a Profitable API Idea
summary: How to find, validate, and position profitable API ideas.

title: Module 3 – Creating APIs (No Code & Code)
summary: Hands-on: build an API via no-code and with Python/Node.

title: Module 4 – Designing APIs for Real-World Use
summary: RESTful design, endpoints, formats, and scalability principles.

title: Module 5 – Securing APIs
summary: Authentication, rate limiting, encryption, and compliance basics.

title: Module 6 – Documenting APIs
summary: OpenAPI/Swagger, examples, and quick-start docs that convert.

title: Module 7 – Deploying and Monetizing APIs
summary: Ship to marketplaces, set pricing, and track usage analytics.

title: Module 8 – Marketing Your API
summary: Grow adoption with landing pages, SEO, content, and community.

title: Module 9 – Maintaining & Scaling
summary: Uptime monitoring, feedback loops, versioning, and scaling.
